sentences.en: All this time, who shall detail the tribulations manifold of her.
sentences.cn: 这些日子以来, 有谁来详述她的种种苦恼呢.

sentences.en: Gaelic can be heard here in manifold forms.
sentences.cn: 在这里可以听见各不相同的盖尔语。

sentences.en: In the roundpiston VV carburetor, the piston is moved by intake - manifold vacuum.
sentences.cn: 在圆形活塞的VV化油器中, 活塞是由进气歧管真空移动的.

sentences.en: Only the blind can realized the manifold blessings that lie in sight.
sentences.cn: 只有盲人才能意识到视觉带来的种种幸福.

sentences.en: Pascal was a man of manifold but contradictory qualities.
sentences.cn: Pascal是个多才多艺然而性格矛盾的人.

sentences.en: She walked about the room, turning over her manifold wrongs.
sentences.cn: 她在房间里走来走去, 深思她受的种种折磨.

sentences.en: The heavier boiling fractions remain, in liquid form on the manifold wall.
sentences.cn: 较重的沸腾着的馏分以液态停留在多孔的壁上.

sentences.en: The ministry of books is manifold.
The moves in chess are not only manifold, but involute.
sentences.cn: 下棋的走法不但多种多样, 而且错综复杂.

sentences.en: The reasons for the delay were manifold.
sentences.cn: 延误的原因是多方面的.

sentences.en: The reasons for this situation are manifold.
sentences.cn: 出现这种情况原因是多方面的。

sentences.en: This vacuum, called intake - manifold vacuum, varies as the operating conditions change.
sentences.cn: 这个真空叫做进气歧管真空.这种进气歧管真空随运转情况而变化.

words.tran_cn: 多方面的，有许多部分的；各式各样的
复写，复印；增多；使……多样化

trans.tran_cn: 多种多样的，多方面的，有多种形式的，有多种用途的
具有多种形式的东西，多支管，歧管（汽车引擎用于进气或排气）
复写，复印；增多；使……多样化
